name: 埃洛伊萨·玛图恩
name_full: 埃洛伊萨·玛图恩 Eloisa Maturen
introduction: Venezuelan Actress, dancer and producerActress and producer Eloísa Maturén is a classical trained dancer who also obtained a Summa Cum Laude degree in Mass Communication at Universidad Central de Venezuela. With ten years of professional experience at the Ballet Teresa Carreño Theatre in Caracas and a profound and avant-garde artistic vision, Maturén has fused her varied careers into one.In 2012, Maturén started her path as an actress supported by the prestigious Venezuelan film maker Fina Torres. She shared the lead role in Torres movie “Liz in September” with actress and international super model Patricia Velasquez (Premiered September 2014).She is currently is based in L.A studying acting at the prestigious Stella Adler Academy of Acting and Theatre with professor and Oscar-winner Milton Justice. She started her formal training in L.A with legendary maestro Gordon Hunt whom she continuous to work with nowadays.
